actions.action: Mitigation plan for delay: HVAC shipment delayed. Steps include contacting vendor, adjusting schedule, exploring alternatives, etc.

Mitigation plan for safety issue: 2025-04-18 - PPE violation observed on Level 2
Conduct safety briefings, assign officers, implement PPE audits, etc.

Mitigation plan for inspection issue: 2025-04-25 - Elevator Pit: Waterproofing membrane not bonded to surface
Rework area, ensure bonding, schedule reinspection.
